briefTitle: Impact of Providing Medical Records in a Patient-Centered, Community Pharmacy Based, HIV Care Model (HIV-MOI)
officialTitle: Assessing the Impact of Providing Pharmacists With Medical Records in a Patient-Centered, Community Pharmacy-Based, HIV Care Model

protocolDocument.label: Study Protocol and Statistical Analysis Plan

eligibilityCriteria.criteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* 18 years of age or older
* African-American
* HIV positive
* At least one of the following: hypertension or diabetes type 2

Exclusion Criteria:

* Pregnant (at screening, may enroll 6 months post-delivery)
* Have a life expectancy \< 2 years
* Refusal to provide medical record release

primary.description: The average A1c in study participants with Diabetes mellitus at the end of their study participation
primary.timeFrame: Through study completion, up to 3 years

primary.description: The average SBP in study participants with hypertension at the end of their study participation
primary.timeFrame: Through study completion, up to 3 years
